page.title: 09School Activities Cont.
page.content: Guitar class. There is a beginners group and a more advanced group. The notes we play are G, D, and A. Mr. Huddleston teaches us. On Tuesday after school a group of children, from class four only, went to Short Tennis in the school hall. The coaches were Mrs.Holloway and Mrs. Holmes. All the children who took part enjoyed it. James Holloway won the area singles final and Robert Holmes and James Holloway won the doubles. Our Tennis club has got quite a lot of rules. I can only remember one of them - if there is an adult waiting for you after 6.00pm and if you are with a child then you have to let the adult go on the court. There is a practise wall as well as four courts. They are building a new pavilion to share with the bowling club.
